title: David Lee Roth - 'Crazy From The Heat - EP' [320k MP3]
description:
David Lee Roth
Crazy From The Heat - EP
[320k MP3]

Crazy from the Heat is a 1985 EP by David Lee Roth, his debut solo release. It was released while Roth was still a member of Van Halen. All four songs on the EP are cover versions, with Roth's version of the Beach Boys hit "California Girls" peaking at #3 on the Billboard Hot 100, which was the same position that the Beach Boys original version reached twenty years prior to Roth's cover. The song "Coconut Grove" is originally by The Lovin' Spoonful.

In 1997, David Lee Roth published Crazy from the Heat, his autobiography.

The medley of "Just a Gigolo" and "I Ain't Got Nobody" is based on Louis Prima's 1956 medley of the two songs.
